verses.verse: Now <S%G1161><s%> concerning things sacrificed to <S%G1494>idols<s%>: <S%G2192>We<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2192>we<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1108>knowledge<s%>. <S%G1108>Knowledge<s%> puffeth <S%G5448>up<s%>, <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G26>love<s%> <S%G3618>edifieth<s%>.

<S%G1161><s%> <S%G1487>If<s%> any <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G1380>thinketh<s%> that he <S%G1492>knoweth<s%> <S%G5100>anything<s%>, he <S%G1097>knoweth<s%> <S%G3762>not<s%> <S%G3764>yet<s%> <S%G2531>as<s%> he <S%G1163>ought<s%> to <S%G1097>know<s%>;

Concerning <S%G4012><s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> the <S%G1035>eating<s%> of things sacrificed to <S%G1494>idols<s%>, we <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> no <S%G1497>idol<s%> is <S%G3762>anything<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> there is no3762, Exodus87 <S%G2316>God<s%> but1487, 3361 <S%G1520>one<s%>.

yet <S%G235><s%> to <S%G2254>us<s%> there is <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, the <S%G3962>Father<s%>, <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> are all <S%G3956>things<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> are all <S%G3956>things<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

Howbeit <S%G235><s%> there is <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> all <S%G3956>men<s%> that <S%G1108>knowledge<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%>, being <S%G4893>used<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> <S%G737>now<s%> to the <S%G1497>idol<s%>, <S%G2068>eat<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> of a thing sacrificed to an <S%G1494>idol<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4893>conscience<s%> <S%G5607>being<s%> <S%G772>weak<s%> is <S%G3435>defiled<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1033>food<s%> will <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3936>commend<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%>: <S%G3777><s%> <S%G3777>neither<s%>, <S%G1437>if<s%> we <S%G5315>eat<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%>, are we the <S%G5302>worse<s%>; <S%G3777>nor<s%>, <S%G1437>if<s%> we <S%G5315>eat<s%>, are we the <S%G4052>better<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> take <S%G991>heed<s%> lest by any <S%G3381>means<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1849>liberty<s%> of <S%G5216>yours<s%> <S%G1096>become<s%> a <S%G4348>stumblingblock<s%> to <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G770>weak<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> a <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G1492>see<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%> who <S%G2192>hast<s%> <S%G1108>knowledge<s%> sitting at <S%G2621>meat<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> an <S%G1493>idol<s%>'s temple, <S%G3618>will<s%> <S%G3780>not<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4893>conscience<s%>, if he <S%G5607>is<s%> <S%G772>weak<s%>, be <S%G3618>emboldened<s%> to eat2068, 1519 things sacrificed to <S%G1494>idols<s%>?

For <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1909>through<s%> <S%G4674>thy<s%> knowledge1108, 622 he that is <S%G770>weak<s%> <S%G622>perisheth<s%>, the <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> whose <S%G3739>sake<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G599>died<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G264>thus<s%>, sinning <S%G3779><s%> <S%G1519>against<s%> the <S%G80>brethren<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5180>wounding<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4893>conscience<s%> when it is <S%G770>weak<s%>, ye <S%G264>sin<s%> <S%G1519>against<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>.

Wherefore <S%G1355><s%>, <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G1033>meat<s%> <S%G4624>causeth<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%> to <S%G4624>stumble<s%>, I will eat5315, 3756 <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G2907>flesh<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G165>evermore<s%>, <S%G3361>that<s%> I <S%G4624>cause<s%> not <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G2443>to<s%> <S%G4624>stumble<s%>.
